title: Grilled prawn and chicken pasta
ingredients: ['1/4 teaspoon chicken seasoning', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper or to taste', '1/8 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/8 teaspoon onion powder', '1 tablespoon garlic granules', '30g butter', '250ml double cream', '125ml milk', '450g linguine pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '125ml white wine', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '225g prawns', '3 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese']
